text: Ebon Moss-Bachrach () (born March 19, 1977) is an American actor. He is known for his role as restaurant manager Richie Jerimovich in the comedy-drama series The Bear (2022â€“present). For this role, he won two Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series. He will play Ben Grimm / The Thing in the movie The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025). Moss-Bachrach was born on March 19, 1977 in New York City.
